meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at a variety of repairs and maintenance tasks around the home.
meanings.sent1: The handypersons fixed the leaky faucet in no time.
meanings.sent2: We hired handypersons to paint our living room.
meanings.sent3: The handypersons joked that they could fix anything except a broken heart.
meanings.sent4: She was like a handypersons, always ready to mend any problem that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The handypersons' toolbox was their best friend, full of solutions for every issue.

meanings.definition: People who are hired to perform various odd jobs or tasks.
meanings.sent1: The handypersons were called in to assemble the new furniture.
meanings.sent2: Our neighbors are reliable handypersons who help out whenever we need them.
meanings.sent3: The handypersons were so busy, they joked about needing a clone to keep up with all the tasks.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of puzzles, the handypersons were the missing piece that made everything fit together.
meanings.sent5: The handypersons' versatility made them indispensable in the neighborhood.
